name: HitsRadioIreland
0:
”Alexa, open hits radio Ireland”
”Alexa start hits radio Ireland”
”Alexa play hits radio Ireland”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hits radio ireland
des:
Welcome to Hits Radio Ireland, Your Music Station

Where timeless melodies meet contemporary music, creating the perfect mix for listeners. Here, we're not just another radio station; we're a musical experience that bridges generations, offering the biggest hits from the swinging 60s right through to today's chart-toppers. With our curated playlists, available 24/7 on your smart speaker and through the TuneIn app, we're here to ensure the soundtrack to your day is nothing short of fantastic.

At Hits Radio Ireland, we believe in the power of music to create emotions, memories, and moments. That’s why our pro deejays, with an impressive 60 years of experience in the radio world, handpicks each song, creating an unforgettable listening experience that you’ll never want to turn off. Our dedication to quality music is unwavering, and our specialized selection caters to the refined tastes of our discerning listeners.

Here at Hits Radio Ireland, every note strikes a chord, every beat tells a story, and every song feels like it's been chosen just for you. Whether you're reliving the classics or discovering today's hits, we promise you the best in music and chat, you'll never think of switching stations again. Welcome to Your Music Station, where greatness resonates and the music never stops.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
